plugins.prepareCmd: node custom-publish/prepare.js dist/common/package.json "${nextRelease.version}" && node custom-publish/prepare.js dist/core/package.json "${nextRelease.version}" && node custom-publish/prepare.js dist/grpc-web-client/package.json "${nextRelease.version}" && node custom-publish/prepare.js dist/worker/package.json "${nextRelease.version}" && node custom-publish/prepare.js dist/worker-client/package.json "${nextRelease.version}" && node custom-publish/prepare.js dist/protoc-gen-ng/package.json "${nextRelease.version}" && node custom-publish/prepare.js dist/well-known-types/package.json "${nextRelease.version}"
plugins.publishCmd: npm publish dist/common --access public && npm publish dist/core --access public && npm publish dist/grpc-web-client --access public && npm publish dist/worker --access public && npm publish dist/worker-client --access public && npm publish dist/protoc-gen-ng --access public && npm publish dist/well-known-types --access public
